programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Upon finding that Crowley has surrounded Kevin's mom with demons, Sam and Dean rescue her and take her along on their quest to find the tablet.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean investigate a string of unusual murders where the victims were all recipients of organs from the same donor. Things become even more complicated when the brothers find their killer in a trance mumbling an ancient prayer.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Sam and Dean become unknowing participants in a unique student film when they investigate a bizarre murder in a college town.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: A severe blizzard causes a city-wide blackout, adding to the obstacles the team must overcome in order to solve a murder case that could be linked to a potential viral outbreak.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: After a fragment of a 17th-century treasure map is stolen, the remains of a museum security guard are found. In order to solve the crime, Booth seeks out a remarkable man with an extraordinary ability to help people find the unfindable.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: Seven pairs of dismembered feet wash ashore after a recent flood on the U.S.-Canada border, but things don't add up when only six of the pairs are identified as research corpses from a nearby university body farm.

programme.title: Bones
programme.desc: The remains of a mythbuster television show host are found in the wilderness, appearing to have been killed by the mythic Chupacabra, a reptile-mammal hybrid creature whose existence has not been confirmed.Guests: Jo Anne Worley, Ryan Cartwright..

programme.desc: NCIS and the FBI investigate a private plane crash in the bayou that killed three sailors. Also, Sonja and Lasalle interview candidates for the team's open agent position.

programme.desc: After a petty officer and member of the prestigious United States Navy Band is murdered in her home, Pride takes temporary custody of the victim's nephew, who is the sole witness to the crime.

programme.title: Sense, Sensibility and Snowmen
programme.desc: A Christmas enthusiast, and her sister, clash with their latest client, a not-so-jolly toy company CEO.

programme.title: Gingerbread Miracle
programme.desc: Two old high school friends spend Christmas trying to sell one of their uncle's Mexican bakery that's known for their gingerbread cookies that magically grant wishes.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: When a travel writer shows up unexpectedly at their dad's B&B, the Ralston family all pretend to be guests in hopes of a good review.

programme.title: Holiday Date
programme.desc: A man poses as a former boyfriend for a woman when she returns home for the holidays. As her family celebrates Christmas, he requests they also celebrate Hanukah and a merry ruse is born.

programme.title: Miss Christmas
programme.desc: Nicknamed 'Miss Christmas,' the official tree finder for the Radcliffee tree lighting, is left desperate to find the perfect tree. A letter sends her to a small town and a man who doesn't want to part with this tree.

programme.title: Christmas at the Plaza
programme.desc: A historian is hired to create a Christmas display at the Plaza. While working, she learns that fate has prevailed and teamed her up with a handsome decorator to help bring the display, and their romance, to life.

programme.title: Christmas at the Palace
programme.desc: A woman agrees to help put on a skating pageant for a Christmas obsessed kingdom. Her joy, and love for the sport, catches the eye of the king, and they instantly fall for each other.

programme.title: The Christmas Cure
programme.desc: An emergency room doctor returns home for Christmas and reunites with old friends and family and is asked to take over her dad's old practice. The doctor must now choose between a new life and an old one.

programme.title: The Santa Stakeout
programme.desc: Two police detectives pose as newlyweds to solve recent holiday party heists. But they are soon swept up by the Christmas spirit while observing their prime suspect, and begin to fall in love.

programme.title: Heart of the Holidays
programme.desc: A career-driven woman returns to her hometown for the holidays and faces her high-school boyfriend. Together, they rediscover what matters most in life.

programme.title: Christmas at Pemberley Manor
programme.desc: A rookie party planner works with a serious and all-business to put together a Christmas festival with help from a merrily enigmatic caretaker who looks like Santa. As the festival approaches, the spirit of the holidays may lead to a wish of love.

programme.title: A Wish for Christmas
programme.desc: Santa grants a wish for a woman and she gets a chance to prove herself to her boss. Santa's wish only gives her 48 hours and as the clock ticks down, she channels the Christmas magic and speaks her mind all on her own.

programme.title: A Nashville Christmas Carol
programme.desc: A television producer is forced to work with the man who broke her heart on a country music Christmas special while being interrupted by Christmas spirits determined for her to revisit her past.

programme.title: Next Stop, Christmas
programme.desc: Angie plans to spend Christmas on her own, but her commuter ride suddenly becomes a Christmas train, and it takes her to her home town in the year 2011.

programme.title: Christmas With the Darlings
programme.desc: When an assistant gives her final notice, she is drawn into helping the charming, younger brother of her wealthy boss as he looks after his orphaned nieces and nephew through Christmas.

programme.title: It's Beginning to Look a Lot Like Christmas
programme.desc: When a New England Christmas decorating competition searches for the town with the most Christmas spirit, the Mayors of East and West Riverton go all out to get their towns to the top of the holiday heap.

programme.title: Once Upon a Holiday
programme.desc: A royal princess runs off from her obligations for a few days to see how the other half lives around Christmas. She winds up falling for a good Samaritan who is unaware of her real identity.

programme.title: The Christmas Club
programme.desc: Two busy strangers are thrown together to help an elderly woman recover her lost savings. While working together, the magic of the season prevails, leading the couple to discover something they have been missing, love.

programme.title: A Very Merry Mix-Up
programme.desc: A woman is headed to spend the holidays with her fiancé's family, but a mix up at the airport lands her at the wrong home. She quickly forms a bond with the 'wrong' family, especially the handsome son.

programme.title: Finding Santa
programme.desc: When the Santa who stars in their annual holiday parade falls off his sleigh and injures himself, a woman must go on a quest to find the perfect Santa.

programme.title: Christmas at Holly Lodge
programme.desc: A woman inherits the Evergreen Inn and Ski Lodge from her parents and starts a new tradition of spending every holiday there. While visiting she meets a family that will change her life.

programme.title: My Christmas Dream
programme.desc: A manager of a department store is determined to land a position in the new Paris location. She sets out to impress the store's owner by creating the best display in stores' history.

programme.title: Never Kiss a Man in a Christmas Sweater
programme.desc: Single mom Maggie is facing Christmas alone until Lucas crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest. Together they overcome Christmas while finding comfort in their growing bond.

programme.title: Christmas by Starlight
programme.desc: When her family's beloved eatery, The Starlight Café, is slated for demolition, Annie vows to put a stop to it before Christmas.
